response.job_title: From E-Manufacturing, alleviating pain and improving the quality of life of millions around the world- We are Zimmer Biomet
response.summary:
Mechanical and Biomedical Engineer with experience in:
• Engineering projects.
• Programming, mathematical modeling and computational simulation.
• Mechanical design and mechanical drawing.
• Manufacture of equipment and machines.
• Design of service and lubrication networks.

Aptitudes
Person characterized by leadership, organization, great interest in learning and teaching, good social and communication skills, responsibility and respect.
response.skills: Investigación, Programación, Ingeniería de proyectos, Engineering, Process Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Product Development

profile_positions.description: Control industrial processes and product quality. Carry out the planning, programming, monitoring and general control of the projects executed in the production area. Manage plant personnel and their productivity. Prepare budgets and authorize plant expenses.
profile_positions.title: Peoduction Engineer

profile_positions.description: Make plans for the manufacture and desing of equipment (tanks, heat exchangers, distillation columns, reactors, etc.) for a palm oil production plant.
profile_positions.title: Desing Engineer

profile_positions.description: Design and coordinate the production of machines for the automotive sector (car lifts, parking duplicators, high-speed gates, etc.). Design special lubrication solutions for the agricultural, mining, automotive and industrial sectors.
profile_positions.title: Desing Engineer

profile_positions.description: Make plans for the manufacture of equipment (tanks, heat exchangers, distillation columns, reactors, etc.) for a biodiesel production plant, in the same way advise part of the mechanical design of this equipment.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical engineer

profile_positions.description: Support in the realization of a document of the state of the existing information, establishing an analysis of the proposed spaces of the laboratories within the framework of the laboratory master plan project.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student of Mechanical Engineering

profile_positions.description: Support the development of detailed engineering of the laboratory projects to be in the new laboratory building. Support in the design of the extraction system and services for the laboratories. Support the hydraulic pre-design of the Engineering Laboratory building.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Student of Mechanical Engineering

company.name: Zimmer Biomet
company.description:
Zimmer Biomet is a global medical technology leader with a comprehensive portfolio designed to maximize mobility and improve health. We advance our mission to alleviate pain and improve the quality of life for patients around the world with our innovative products and suite of integrated digital and robotic technologies leverage data, data analytics and artificial intelligence. Founded in 1927 and based in Warsaw, Zimmer Biomet has operations in more than 25 countries and sales in more than 100 countries. We maintain world-class scientific facilities and resources and collaborate with leading clinicians and researchers around the world. 

Awards and Recognitions  
•	Forbes Best-in-State Employers in Indiana (2020 and 2021)
•	Newsweek’s America’s Most Responsible Companies (2021)
•	Military Friendly Employer by VIQTORY (2019 and 2020)
•	Best Employer Award: China (2011-2021)
•	Great Place to Work: Brazil (2021)
•	Indiana Manufacturers Association Manufacturing Excellence Awards (2020)
•	ComputerWorld’s "Best Places to Work in IT" (2018-2020)
•	Forbes Global 2000 (2020 and 2021)
•	Fortune 500 List (2020 and 2021)
•	Medical Device and Diagnostic Industry MedTech Company of the Year (2019)
